name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Batman’s Throne: Ruler of the Shadows  Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sit on The Batman’s throne, ruler of shadows, in this live wallpaper, featuring sleek design, dynamic visuals, and quick shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
